channel.itunes:summary:
Leo Laporte, Gina Trapani, Jeff Jarvis and their guests talk about the latest Google and cloud computing news.
Records live at http://live.twit.tv/ every Wednesday at 1:00pm PT/4:00pm ET.
channel.description:
Leo Laporte, Gina Trapani, Jeff Jarvis and their guests talk about the latest Google and cloud computing news.

channel.itunes:keywords: TWiT, Google, cloud computing, Jeff Jarvis, Gina Trapani, Leo Laporte

item.title: TWiG 233: Glass Goes to the Movies
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.author: leo@twit.tv (Leo Laporte)
item.description:
Hosts:Leo Laporte,Jeff Jarvis and Gina Trapani

Guest:Danny Sullivan

Matt Cutts SEO signals, Google Glass best practices, why is Yahoo gaining traction, and more!

Download or subscribe to this show at twit.tv/twig.

We invite you to read, add to, and amend our show notes.

Thanks to Cachefly for the bandwidth for this show.
